name: moe.js
description: Moe is an extremely simple javascript visal novel engine, made (not yet, but soon) on top of combination of [Pixi.js](https://github.com/pixijs/pixi.js) and [howler.js](https://github.com/goldfire/howler.js/), and then wrapped with [Apache Cordova](https://cordova.apache.org/) and [Electron](https://github.com/electron/electron).
author: Nikolay Solovyov <i@mr-ozio.ru>
